marklogic.body:
GWBush spent 3.7 trillion on two unfunded wars, said the Iraq war would be paid for by the Iraqi oil...but he sent 250,000 Iraqi troops home, with no jobs, no money and in days they Raided the unguarded Iraqi Army weapons depots and blew up the oil wells, the pipelines, looted the power stations for copper, and the water pumping stations too for copper, looted the cities for food, and supplies and started making IED's and blowing up our troops...and when Cheney tried to sell those Burning Iraqi oil wells to his friends cheap..Baghdad got mad and sold the rights to China and Russia for more money....
General Patton kept the Nazis in charge of the power stations, water pumping stations, the rail roads, until he had trained people to replace them.
I don't think much of GOP planning...We are going to be paying for GWBush's high gas prices for decades..
